article.title: Renewable Resources - Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn about the renewable resources industry in Utah.
article.content:
â€‹

The purpose of the Commercial Service is to facilitate the expansion of yourUtah business into the global renewable resources marketplace. The Commercial Service has many resources to help you expand your business globally! Weare able to providecurrent market research articles, arrangemeetings with international buyers, and help yourcompany through the exporting process.Thisassistance will allow youto keep ahead of your competitors.

For more information on renewable resources or to requestmarket researcharticles regarding renewable resources, please contact David Fiscusby phone at (801)255-1873, or via email atdavid.fiscus@trade.gov.
